price: nevertheless it is a mercy from your Lord[77], for His favor to you is truly great.
arabic: إِلَّا رَحۡمَةٗ مِّن رَّبِّكَۚ إِنَّ فَضۡلَهُۥ كَانَ عَلَيۡكَ كَبِيرٗا
footnotes: [77] Allah would not take away the Qur’an, out of mercy to His Prophet and to His servants.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: illā raḥmatan min rabbika inna faḍlahu kāna ʿalayka kabīran
